fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-When you challenge a player, they will be roleblocked that night through immunities and will be given the message “You were carried to a casino and forced to play a game of blackjack.”
-You have a night chat with all the players, except when you speak you appear as “The Dealer”
-All players, including you, are forced to bet one of their abilities.
-You can challenge players as many times as you desire, as long as they still have something to bet
-If you lose all your playing chips, you die
-If people lose all their abilities, they commit suicide due to debt
-Any abilities you win are converted into playing chips
-Players can spend 5 playing chips to purchase another ability from a role that’s in the same slot as them (Town killing roles will get another town killing role’s ability)

fields.name: Abilities (cont.):
fields.value: -Since you’re playing as the house, you know if the next card will make you go over 21, but don’t know which card it is
